title: Walking Through Time
description: 1998 Windswept trade paperback, Lauren Walden Rabb (Interview with Mrs. Berlinski). The novel intertwines the lives of two women born a century apart who share little, but nevertheless sustain a deep connection. Eleanor, who lives in the present, discovers a packet of Gertrude's letters which lead her on a journey of self-discovery. - Amazon
author: Lauren Walden Rabb
